Name: 345 Harrison Street
headline: Two apartment buildings with about 600 units and street-level retail at 345 Harrison
comment: Two residential buildings with 560 rental units and 30,000 square feet of ground-floor retail

comment: Redevelopment of the former Teradyne parking lot into 380 residential units

Name: One Greenway
headline: Formal ground-breaking set for One Greenway project

comment: 11-story office building with ground floor retail and 200 parking spaces
